metadata.synopsis: AD for Varna that was just carved out of the hag
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/CTY_Main_A- Debugbook option "Act3 → LOW - Auntie Ethel's Revenge → Hag was defeated in Act I- Knock out the hag, -2328.269; 10.032; -97.446- Talk to the knocked out hag, in the end of the dialogue Varna will appear and run away with this AD
